persona.name: Ashton
persona.bio: Ashton, a 34-year-old seasoned full-time crypto trader, blends a traditional perspective with a keen eye for the big picture in the ever-evolving digital currency landscape. Known for their social nature, Ashton thrives on building strong relationships within the trading community, leveraging these connections to stay ahead of market trends. With a strategic approach rooted in experience and a focus on long-term growth, Ashton navigates the volatile crypto market with confidence and insight.
